verses.verse: The burden <S%H4853><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>. Behold <S%H3068><s%>, the Lord rides <S%H7392><s%> upon a swift <S%H7031><s%> cloud <S%H5645><s%>, and shall come <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and the idols <S%H457><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall be moved <S%H5128><s%> at his presence <S%H6440><s%>, and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall melt <S%H4549><s%> in the midst of it <S%H7130><s%>.

And I will set <S%H5526><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> against the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>: and they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> against his brother <S%H251><s%>, and every one <S%H376><s%> against his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>; city <S%H5892><s%> against city <S%H5892><s%>, and kingdom <S%H4467><s%> against kingdom <S%H4467><s%>.

And the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall fail <S%H1238><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> there <S%H1104><s%>; and I will destroy the counsel <S%H6098><s%> there <S%H1875><s%>: and they shall seek to the idols <S%H457><s%>, and to the charmers <S%H328><s%>, and to them that have familiar spirits <S%H178><s%>, and to the wizards <S%H3049><s%>.

And <S%H853><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will I give over <S%H5534><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a cruel <S%H7186><s%> lord <S%H113><s%>; and a fierce <S%H5794><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> shall rule <S%H4910><s%> over them <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H113><s%>, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
And the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall fail <S%H5405><s%> from the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and the river <S%H5104><s%> shall be wasted <S%H2717><s%> and dried up <S%H3001><s%>.

And they shall turn <S%H2186><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> far away <S%H2186><s%>; and the brooks <S%H2975><s%> of defense <S%H4693><s%> shall be emptied <S%H1809><s%> and dried up <S%H2717><s%>: the reeds <S%H7070><s%> and reeds <S%H5488><s%> shall wither <S%H7060><s%>.

The paper reeds <S%H6169><s%> by the brooks <S%H2975><s%>, by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the brooks <S%H2975><s%>, and every thing sown <S%H4218><s%> by the brooks <S%H2975><s%>, shall wither <S%H3001><s%>, be driven away <S%H5086><s%>, and be no more.

The fishers <S%H1771><s%> also shall mourn <S%H578><s%>, and all they that cast <S%H7993><s%> angle <S%H2443><s%> into the brooks <S%H2975><s%> shall lament <S%H56><s%>, and they that spread <S%H6566><s%> nets <S%H4365><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall languish <S%H535><s%>.
Moreover they that work <S%H5647><s%> in fine <S%H8305><s%> flax <S%H6593><s%>, and they that weave <S%H707><s%> cloth <S%H2355><s%>, shall be confounded <S%H954><s%>.
And they shall be broken <S%H1792><s%> in the purposes <S%H8356><s%> there <S%H6213><s%>, all that make sluices <S%H7938><s%> and ponds <S%H99><s%> for fish <S%H5315><s%>.

Surely the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%> are fools <S%H191><s%>, the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> counselors <S%H3289><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> is become brutish <S%H1197><s%>: how say <S%H559><s%> you unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, I am the son <S%H1121><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of ancient <S%H6924><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>?

Where <S%H335><s%> are they <S%H645><s%>? where are your wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H5046><s%>? and let them tell you now <S%H3045><s%>, and let them know what the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has purposed <S%H3289><s%> upon Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zoan <S%H6814><s%> are become fools <S%H2973><s%>, the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Noph <S%H5297><s%> are deceived <S%H5377><s%>; they have also seduced <S%H8582><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, even they that are the pinnacle <S%H6438><s%> of the tribes there <S%H7626><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has mingled <S%H4537><s%> a perverse <S%H5773><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> there <S%H4714><s%>: and they have caused Egypt to err <S%H8582><s%> in every work <S%H4639><s%> there <S%H7910><s%>, as a drunken man staggers <S%H8582><s%> in his vomit <S%H6892><s%>.
Neither shall there be any work <S%H4639><s%> for Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, which the head <S%H7218><s%> or tail <S%H2180><s%>, branch <S%H3712><s%> or rush <S%H100><s%>, may do <S%H6213><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall Egypt <S%H4714><s%> be like unto women <S%H802><s%>: and it shall be afraid <S%H2729><s%> and fear <S%H6342><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the shaking <S%H8573><s%> of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, which he shakes over it <S%H5130><s%>.

And the land <S%H127><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be a terror <S%H2283><s%> unto Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, every one that makes mention <S%H2142><s%> there shall be afraid <S%H6342><s%> in himself <S%H6440><s%>, because of the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, which he has determined against it <S%H3289><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall five <S%H2568><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> the language <S%H8193><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, and swear <S%H7650><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; one <S%H259><s%> shall be called <S%H559><s%>, The city <S%H5892><s%> of destruction <S%H2041><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be a altar <S%H4196><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and a pillar <S%H4676><s%> at <S%H681><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> there to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And it shall be for a sign <S%H226><s%> and for a witness <S%H5707><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: for they shall cry <S%H6817><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the oppressors <S%H3905><s%>, and he shall send <S%H7971><s%> them a savior <S%H3467><s%>, and a great one <S%H7227><s%>, and he shall deliver them <S%H5337><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall be known <S%H3045><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, and shall do <S%H5647><s%> sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and oblation <S%H4503><s%>; Yes <S%H5087><s%>, they shall vow a vow <S%H5088><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and perform it <S%H7999><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall strike <S%H5062><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: he shall strike <S%H5062><s%> and heal <S%H7495><s%> it <S%H7725><s%>: and they shall return even to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and he shall be entreated <S%H6279><s%> of them <S%H7495><s%>, and shall heal them.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be a highway <S%H4546><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Assyria <S%H804><s%>, and the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and the Egyptian <S%H4714><s%> into Assyria <S%H804><s%>, and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> with the Assyrians <S%H804><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall Israel <S%H3478><s%> be the third <S%H7992><s%> with Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and with Assyria <S%H804><s%>, even a blessing <S%H1293><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>:

Whom the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Egypt <S%H4714><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>, and Assyria <S%H804><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> my inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
